name: LUCID - Prototype
description:
This is a prototype for my game Lucid.

I am aware not everything works perfectly! But the game is playable and I would like to get some playtesting done :)

Once you have played it please could you fill in this form:

https://docs.google.com/forms/d/e/1FAIpQLSc1KKX_LBDh3NHYqGXgv6vt3lErNPRD5bUZyvE6...

Thank you!
